casebody.data:
Henry Gottgetreu, as assignee, &c., appellant, v. Alexander V. Davidson, as sheriff, &c., respondent. Decided June 1, 1885. Appeal by plaintiff from judgment entered in favor of the' defendant upon the verdict of a jury, and from order denying plaintiff’s motion for a new trial. Oliver W. Beals, for appellant. W. Bourke Cockran, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and Truax, JJ.

Opinion by Freedman, J.

Judgment and order affirmed, with costs.
